title: Business Practical Skills Enhancement: Introductory Cybersecurity Education Through Playable Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and understanding of network concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain threat identification and response procedures through cybersecurity incident simulations
Learners can perform decision-making processes for security planning and implementation with over 80% accuracy through team-based collaboration
Learners can present case-specific applications of core cybersecurity skills (encryption, access control, etc.) required for professional practice
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
